thread.title: Salman cheers Vijender Singh for first battle
thread.title_full: Salman cheers Vijender Singh for first battle

author: CanIndia News Service 1
title: Salman cheers Vijender Singh for first battle
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Mumbai, October 12 (CINEWS): Salman Khan and Taapsee Pannu took to twitter to cheer for boxer Vijender Singh for his introduction in professional boxing at the Manchester Area on Saturday. 
The fight which is featured as “World War III” will have the nation’s first Olympic and World Championship – medallist, tackling England’s Sonny Whiting. 
“All d best @boxervijender for ur first pro fight tmrw . wl watch n cheer,” Salman tweeted. 
While Taapsee tweeted “Good luck champ @boxervijender.” Related Posts
